Purpose: To perform immunohistochemical staining for LECT2 to generate accurate and consistent staining results (without interpretation).
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Automated stainer (e.g., Ventana BenchMark ULTRA, Dako Autostainer, Leica BOND-III)
